challenge.title: Step 14
challenge.description: Inside your elif clause, replace pass with a call to the _insert method with right child of the current node as the first argument and key as the second argument. Assign the result to the right attribute of the current node.

tests.text: You should remove the pass keyword from the elif block.
You should call the self._insert() method passing node.right and key as the arguments.
You should assign the result of your self._insert() call to the right attribute (node.right) of the current node.
